channel.title: Elddem The MMORPG-56k Image Warning
channel.description:
[size=25pt][shadow=red,left][u][b]Elddem The MMORPG[/b][/u][/shadow][/size]
What is Elddem?- Elddem is a MMORPG in development and is based around the fantsy/middevil genre
Where can I play?- Elddem is only open to Beta Testers atm at- [url=http://www.soulgamerz.net]www.soulgamerz.net[/url]
Will I have to pay money to play later on?- Yes and no There will be an option to buy items and gold:D later on but playing just normally is FREE!
What Development stage is Elddem in?- Beta 1.1a
Do you need help and who is helping?- It is mainly me working on this right now but you may join in and help by making Models, Graphics, and more you can check out right here for different contests [url=http://soulgamerz.net/forums/index.php?topic=107.0]http://soulgamerz.net/forums/index.php?topic=107.0[/url]
When Will Elddem be fully released?- Elddem will probly be open to EVERYONE in a few months time
Where can I find more info?- You can find more info and join the Beta or help model etc. at [url=http://www.soulgamerz.net]www.soulgamerz.net[/url] or [url=http://www.elddem.net]www.elddem.net[/url] (Just bought elddem.net will be avalible in about 24 hours)
Screenshots-
[url=http://soulgamerz.net][IMG]http://img118.imageshack.us/img118/6584/elddemtreegx0.png[/img][/url]
Spiders and example of the weather raining- [url=http://soulgamerz.net][IMG]http://img83.imageshack.us/img83/9859/spidersjg4.png[/img][/url]
The Huge Forest- [url=http://soulgamerz.net][IMG]http://img63.imageshack.us/img63/2687/forestdp6.png[/img][/url]
A In Development (Dark Sword Model)- [url=http://soulgamerz.net][img]http://img376.imageshack.us/img376/9959/darkswordmv0.png[/img][/url]
In Development (Mystic Sword Model)- [URL=http://soulgamerz.net][IMG]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/7923/mysticswordmg7.png[/img][/URL]
More Screenshots will be posted here and on the SoulGamerz.net Forums
Thanks And hope to see you at SoulGamerz, Kilk

item.title: Elddem The MMORPG-56k Image Warning
item.dc:creator: @David David
item.description:
@David wrote:

kilk:

:DWow I take that as a huge compliment if it is from Miss Silabasoft <---- <3[br][size=1]Posted at: July 17, 2006, 09:28:32 PM[/size][hr] :rolleyes: Blitz/ C++ well in a way this is made with a game engine and if you know which please dont say as people may try to take ideas and use it on theres, but the models i make mainly in Milkshape3d and Blender and export them as a .b3d

Why are you not telling people who the engine was programmed by?!?

That’s like stealing their engine and not giving them credit, they’ve done most/all of the programming for you.

EDIT: Fuck, they basically do it ALL for you.

Read full topic
